software.cudafdmt: a CUDA-based tool for fast and efficient data manipulation
software.fredfof.py: a Python script that performs a friend-of-friend (FoF) clustering algorithm on the output of cudafdmt
software.plot_fredda_cand.py: a Python script that plots the candidates identified by the FoF algorithm

commands.aprun: a tool for launching and managing parallel applications on a cluster
commands.find: a command-line utility for searching for files
commands.dirname: a command-line utility for extracting the directory name from a path
commands.pushd: a command-line utility for changing directories and keeping track of the original directory
commands.popd: a command-line utility for returning to the previous directory
